sentence.text: In families severely affected with breast cancer, we identified inherited negative regulation of protein export from nucleus missense mutations Cys53Trp, Cys71Tyr, and Cys83Arg that alter three zinc-binding residues of the BARD1 RING domain.

entity.text: negative regulation of protein export from nucleus

sentence.text: Missense mutations that disrupt the RING domain of the tumor suppressor gene double-strand break repair via homologous recombination lead to increased risk of breast and ovarian cancer.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
